Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the data structures which are exposed to the application.

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum DMA_AddrMode_e DMA_AddrMode

DMA addressing mode for a given transfer.

Enum for DMA addressing for a given transfer.

typedef struct DMA_ChannelStatus_t DMA_ChannelStatus

DMA Channel Control Status.

DMA Channel status structure to be used with the DMA_getChannelStatus() call.

typedef enum DMA_ChPriority_e DMA_ChPriority

DMA Channel Priority Type.

Enum for DMA Channel Priority type.

typedef enum DMA_ChTriggerType_e DMA_ChTriggerType

DMA Channel Trigger Type.

Enum for DMA Channel Trigger type.

typedef struct DMA_CtrlPktParams_t DMA_CtrlPktParams

DMA Channel Control Packet Parameters.

DMA Control Packet parameters are used to with the DMA_setChannelParams() call.

typedef enum DMA_DebugMode_e DMA_DebugMode

DMA Debug Mode.

Enum for DMA Peripheral's behavior when it is entering suspend

typedef enum DMA_ElemSize_e DMA_ElemSize

DMA Transfer Type for a given channel.

Enum for DMA Transfer type for a given channel.

typedef struct DMA_HWAttrs_t DMA_HWAttrs

DMA H/W Parameters.

DMA parameters are used with the DMA_open() call.

typedef void(* DMA_IntHandlerFuncPTR) (uint32_t channel, DMA_IntType inttype, void *arg)

DMA Interrupt callback function.

DMA Interrupt callback function to be used with DMA_enableInterrupt() call

typedef enum DMA_IntType_e DMA_IntType

DMA Interrupt Type.

Enum for DMA Interrupt type.

typedef struct DMA_Params_t DMA_Params

DMA Parameters.

DMA parameters are used to with the DMA_open() call. These parameters will be applied only in the first DMA_open() call Subsequent DMA_open() calls will ignore this parameter.

typedef enum DMA_PriScheme_e DMA_PriScheme

DMA Priority Scheme.

Enum for DMA Peripheral's priority scheme for handling requests in its low pri and high pri queue.

Fixed Priority scheme

  • lower the channel number, the higher its priority
  • A channel will be arbitrated out whenever there is a higher pending channel.
  • Otherwise a channel is completely serviced until its transfer count reaches zero before the next highest pending channel is serviced

Rotation based Priority scheme

  • round-robin scheme
  • Arbitration is performed when the FIFO is empty
typedef struct DMA_Status_t DMA_Status

DMA Status.

DMA peripheral status structure to be used with the DMA_getStatus() call.

typedef enum DMA_XferType_e DMA_XferType

DMA Transfer Type for a given channel.

Enum for DMA Transfer type for a given channel.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DMA_AddrMode_e

DMA addressing mode for a given transfer.

Enum for DMA addressing for a given transfer.

Enumerator
DMA_AddrMode_Constant 

constant addressing mode: source and/or destination address do not change between each elemen transfer

DMA_AddrMode_PostIncrement 

post increment addressing mode: source and/or destination address are post incremented by the source and/or destination element size after each element transfer

DMA_AddrMode_Indexed 

indexed addressing mode: source and/or destination address are post incremented as defined by the source and/or destination element and frame index offset parameters after each element and frame transfer respectively

enum DMA_ChPriority_e

DMA Channel Priority Type.

Enum for DMA Channel Priority type.

Enumerator
DMA_ChPriority_Low 

Channel assigned to high Priority

DMA_ChPriority_High 

Channel assigned to low Priority

enum DMA_ChTriggerType_e

DMA Channel Trigger Type.

Enum for DMA Channel Trigger type.

Enumerator
DMA_ChTriggerType_HW 

Channel Triggered via H/W

DMA_ChTriggerType_SW 

Channel Triggered via S/W

enum DMA_DebugMode_e

DMA Debug Mode.

Enum for DMA Peripheral's behavior when it is entering suspend

Enumerator
DMA_DebugMode_IgnoreSuspend 

Ignore the suspend. The DMA continues to be operational as in functional mode when debug mode is active

DMA_DebugMode_FinishBlock 

Finish current block transfer and continue after suspend ends

DMA_DebugMode_FinishFrame 

Finish current frame transfer and continue after suspend ends

DMA_DebugMode_Immediate 

Immediate stop at a DMA channel arbitration boundary

enum DMA_ElemSize_e

DMA Transfer Type for a given channel.

Enum for DMA Transfer type for a given channel.

Enumerator
DMA_ElemSize_8bit 

element size is 8-bit data

DMA_ElemSize_16bit 

element size is 16-bit data

DMA_ElemSize_32bit 

element size is 32-bit data

DMA_ElemSize_64bit 

element size is 64-bit data

enum DMA_IntType_e

DMA Interrupt Type.

Enum for DMA Interrupt type.

Enumerator
DMA_IntType_FTC 

DMA Peripheral's FTC interrupt type

DMA_IntType_LFS 

DMA Peripheral's LFS interrupt type

DMA_IntType_HBC 

DMA Peripheral's HBC interrupt type

DMA_IntType_BTC 

DMA Peripheral's BTC interrupt type

DMA_IntType_BER 

DMA Peripheral's BER interrupt type

DMA_IntType_NUM 

DMA Peripheral's total number of interrupts

enum DMA_PriScheme_e

DMA Priority Scheme.

Enum for DMA Peripheral's priority scheme for handling requests in its low pri and high pri queue.

Fixed Priority scheme

  • lower the channel number, the higher its priority
  • A channel will be arbitrated out whenever there is a higher pending channel.
  • Otherwise a channel is completely serviced until its transfer count reaches zero before the next highest pending channel is serviced

Rotation based Priority scheme

  • round-robin scheme
  • Arbitration is performed when the FIFO is empty
Enumerator
DMA_PriScheme_Fixed 

Fixed - lower the channel number, the higher its priority

DMA_PriScheme_Rotation 

round-robin scheme - Arbitration is performed when the FIFO is empty.

enum DMA_XferType_e

DMA Transfer Type for a given channel.

Enum for DMA Transfer type for a given channel.

Enumerator
DMA_XferType_Frame 

frame transfer: one DMA request (hw or sw) triggers one complete frame transfer (i.e. 'elemXferCnt' number of element transfers)

DMA_XferType_Block 

block transfer: one DMA request (hw or sw) triggers one complete block transfer (i.e. 'frameXferCnt' number of frame transfers)
